thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 86 of 7354
thread.title: Brent

author: Brent
title: Brent
text: Always great information, good prices and good details about cameras! Wish they had a little more information on the warranty and when I went to call and inquire about the Warranty they were not open at 12 PM PST. on a Friday. Kinda strange! If they had been a less well known store/website I probably would have not purchased from them specifically for those reasons. But overall I feel mostly confident in B&H
